poemContent:
Butcher: Did you mean Guts kind sir? Well i`ll be surprised
Person: No I meant organs
Butcher: Haha! very funny joke, no I`m sure you meant Guts


Uncool visage of decrepid death,
Come face the last breath,
Down, it lies, underneath
Stack of stones and long lost
Bones. A coincidence of sorrow.

A man once took a leap here,
To the tombs below.

A wreath of organs.
Encrusted fate.
